title: sarvalOka sharaNya
sahitya:
sarvalOka sharaNya.  rAgA: nAdanAmakriyA.  Adi tALA.


1:  sarvalOka sharaNya shrI SADguNya paripUrNa
 sarvajIva kAruNya sajjana munigaNa puNya
 caraNam 2    kSIra sAgara vihAra dIna nAtha shrtamandAra
 dAraNi dharmam tazhaikka avataritta divya dashAvatAra
 caraNam 3    nIyE enran annai tandai nIyE endan jIvan yAvum
 ninnaruLE enpErinbam ilaiyEl enakkellAm tunbam
